alert.note: Alert for Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 12:56AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Keith County through 1245 AM MDT... At 1155 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingsley Dam, or near Ogallala, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Keystone, Kingsley Dam, Nevens and Broganville. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 93 and 102. Highway 92 between mile markers 136 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska near mile marker 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
